title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

title: Space Gun
description: See the world upside-down, dangling from high up above the ground!

title: Air Race
description: An exhilarating flight simulation with banks, loops and dives.

title: Water Pendulum
description: Hold on tight as you glide up and down on a water tube across a U-shaped slide!

title: Korneto
description: Slide, swirl and splash through a whirling vortex on this slippery ride!

title: Water Falls
description: Get drenched under a cascading waterfall with steep rocks.

title: Happy Kangaroo
description: Plummet into a safe freefall with a tall & cheerful kangaroo!

title: Pony Train
description: Hop onto a chariot-pulled pony ride through the world of fantasy!

title: Mini Pirate Ship
description: Sail like a pirate on a miniature, adrenaline-filled flying boat!

title: Korneto
description: Slide, swirl and splash through a whirling vortex on this slippery ride!

title: Twisters
description: Zoom down through a twisty maze of tunnels into a splashy escape!

title: Water Pendulum
description: Hold on tight as you glide up and down on a water tube across a U-shaped slide!

title: Fusion Slide
description: Glide through a snaky water wormhole, wrapped in a kaleidoscopic light show!

title: Wave Pool
description: Experience the bliss of waves washing over you, far away from the sea.

title: Mammoth
description: Whiz through liquid loops with your crew before splashing into a smooth landing!

title: Rapid River
description: Navigate your way through 10 interconnected pools & a five-headed hydra!

title: Boomerang
description: Shoot out of a tube and swoop back like a boomerang on this thrilling slide!

title: Water Coaster
description: Speed straight down a slide with no loops to slow you down!

title: Fun Racers
description: Hold your rubber mat tight as you glide through curvy bumps on 8 water slides!

title: Water Falls
description: Get drenched under a cascading waterfall with steep rocks.

title: Rain Disco
description: Show off your moves under a rainy, kaleidoscopic light show!

title: Jungle Lagoon
description: Dive, swim and enjoy non-stop fun in this triple pool paradise with sprinklers!

title: Drop Loop
description: Slide down a sky-high slope, twist through a loop and make a splashy exit!

title: Jungle Lagoon
description: Race down water slides, climb a treehouse and wade through a shallow lagoon!

title: Lazy River
description: Drift through a calm river that snakes through an alligator and gargoyle skull.

title: Boomerang
description: Shoot out of a tube and swoop back like a boomerang on this thrilling slide!

title: Harakiri
description: Rush down, take a breather, and slide back down to the finish for pure, non-stop thrill!

title: Fun Racers
description: Slither down through thrilling tiers on this smooth and slippery adventure!

title: Uphill Racers
description: Hold your rubber mat tight as you race through curvy bumps on this water slide!

title: Mission Interstellar
description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

title: Net Walk
description: Navigate through an adventurous, elevated maze of nylon ropes!

title: VR Coaster
description: Strap into a heart-pounding, immersive VR-enhanced rollercoaster experience!

title: Wonder Splash
description: Race up a steep incline and hurtle down into a big splash!

title: Mystic Saucer
description: Spin around in a thrilling pot placed on a rotating turntable floor!

title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

title: Fire Brigade
description: Hop on board, take aim and douse the fire with water guns in this whirlwind ride!

title: Sky Wheel
description: Firmly straddled atop a 443 meters tall building, the Sky Wheel at Wonderla Amusement Park, Hyderabad

title: Crazy Cars
description: Dash and crash into your friends’ cars in your very own Formula 1 circuit!

title: Dancing Cars
description: Glide along the floor on cars that dance to your favourite beats!

title: Rocki'n Tug
description: Set sail on a rocky sea adventure, from the safety of land!

title: Termite Coaster
description: Ride on the edge with sharp curves, steep climbs and dizzying drops!

title: Adventures of Chikku
description: Buckle up for a hyper-realistic 3D adventure with gusts of wind and water splashes!

title: Jumping Frog
description: Hop on a frog and leap into ribbiting fun as you spin around!

title: Cinemagic Ride
description: Step into a VR journey where seats move, sounds roar and visuals leap out at you!

title: Crazy Wagon
description: Get whisked away in an oscillating wagon attached to a sky-high windmill blade!

title: Pirate Ship
description: Soar high & hurtle to and fro on a thrilling boat that sails on thin air!

title: Air Race
description: An exhilarating flight simulation with banks, loops and dives.

title: Recoil
description: India’s first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride!

title: Equinox 360
description: A thrill monster that flips you around 360 degrees in a gravity-defying spin.

description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

description: Maintain your balance through an adventurous, elevated maze of nylon ropes!
